channel.title: Does Magic Barrier not count as a visit?
channel.description:
#### What happened? I was a Court Wizard in a Cult game (latest patch). I was accused and executed because the Observer saw me not visit anyone the night I claimed to have Magic Barrier'ed (which I did). The Observer was not converted and in the post-game he confirmed me he saw me not visiting. Incidentally, I was barrier'ing him that night, so no weird shenanigans should have been possible (the new Apostle can't Mind Warp anyway).
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? The Observer should have seen me visit him.
#### Steps to reproduce: Use Magic Barrier as a Court Wizard and have an Observer follow you.
#### Comments: I'm assuming this is a bug, since nowhere does it says that Magic Barrier doesn't count as a visit.
